AcquirePlan.Title: Acquire an Additional Plan
AcquirePlan.Msg01: Each additional plan allows you to gain even more, due to the Compound Mothly Rate.
AcquirePlan.point01: All the Additional Plans are acquired only in bitcoins (BTC).
AcquirePlan.point02: Commission for withdrawals within the first 12 months = 14%
AcquirePlan.point04: Withdrawal availability: between 48 and 72 business hours.
AcquirePlan.MsgPart01: You are aquiring an Additional Plan of
AcquirePlan.MsgPart02: with a Monthly Compound Rate of
AcquirePlan.MsgPart03: The payment process will continue in a new window
AcquirePlan.MsgPart04: For your security, we will close this session.

Instructions.Title: Instructions for the payment in bitcoins
Instructions.Subtitle1: To pay you must have your bitcoin payment application at hand.
Instructions.Subtitle2: You will only have 7:00 minutes to complete the payment. If you exceed the time, you will have to try again.
Instructions.Step1: Enter to your bitcoin payment application.
Instructions.Step2: Scan the QR code or copy and paste the ammount to pay in bitcoins and the payment address.
Instructions.Step3: Make the payment through your application and wait for the confirmation at this window.
Instructions.Highlight: Do not close the browser, otherwise the payment will not be made.
Instructions.Step4: Once the confirmation appears, a payment receipt will arrive to your email address. Check your inbox or SPAM.
Instructions.Step5: And done! In a period of 48 to 72 business hours, your account will be activated.

AcquirePlan.AmmountInvest: Enter the ammount you want to invest (>10,000)

Community.Title: My community
Community.Description: Verify your data and keep it updated.
Community.AssignedTip: They are your associates who assign you to the system by the rule 5-1.
Community.GuestTip: They are your guests whom you have invited to join your community, but have not yet registered with your referral link.
Community.ProspectsTip: They are your guests who already have registered, but have not yet concluded the payment for their Smart Membership.
Community.PromotesTip: They are the people who affiliated other associates from your community and that generate for you bonuses for assignment and multiplicación.
Community.LevelTip: They are your guests who have obtained this qualification by growing their community in the first 18 weeks.
Community.InvestmentTip: They are your guests who have one or more Additional Plans.

Community.DirectAssociateTip: The people that you recruited directly.

Ecosystem.Title:
Entrepreneurial Ecosystem
Coming soon!
Ecosystem.Message:
The Entrepreneurial Ecosystem encompasses a series of unique benefits that you have from being part of the SBC community.

These tools are designed to help you with your personal and business development.
Ecosystem.Academy: The only platform where you will be able to train and transform yourself into a successfull entrepeneur.
Ecosystem.Account: Monitor Membership returns and Aditional Plans.
Ecosystem.Live: Discover new perspectives of the economy and finances world. Start a business and go for more with SBC Live.
Ecosystem.Network: Stay in contact with the best and learn to grow your community.
Ecosystem.Innovator: Development platform and acceleration of productive projects.
Ecosystem.Catalog: Boost your business and increase sells by promoting your products and services in an entrepeneur community.
